ygData.subject: Re: Pixie Strike broken (was Charm)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It was not in the letter.  I ve been /bugging it.  Now that I m hitting the upper level limit for charm, I m getting more annoyed by it and will probably
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 18 Oct 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> Was Pixie Strike not working properly mentioned in the GZ letter? Are bards
> with the capability to sing this song submitting bug reports? I assume some
> of you have. Perhaps if enough people submit a bug report it will get
> fixed.

It was not in the letter. I've been /bugging it. Now that
I'm hitting the upper level limit for charm, I'm getting more
annoyed by it and will probably fire off an email to GZ asking
about it at some point.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
